diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Ectopic parathyroid gland hyperplasia in the pyriform sinus
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the incidental finding of an ectopic parathyroid gland during endoscopy, accompanied by elevated serum calcium and intact PTH levels. The pathology report confirmed hyperplasia of the ectopic parathyroid gland, and the patient's serum calcium and PTH levels normalized following resection.
